name: Draw From Earth (itch)
description:
Draw from Earth is a Rogue-Like, Turn-based Card Game, You are the Leader, as Flagship, Finding your Origin is your Ultimate goal.

Game Play

  • Inspired by Duelyst, Making Deck with Infinite Synergy
  • On Grid-Style battlefield, Spawn your forces, Unleash your fire with perfect positioning.

Game Development Statues

  • The current development progress is in early stage of alpha, by solo developer. 
  • The basic game mechanism is set on foundation, So the quality/quantity of content is the focus.

Feedback

  • I do streaming at Twitch as development this project, So join and share your ideas & insight
  • Also I made Discord Channel, You can comment and feedback there, When I'm offline.
